fields.value: Replication data for: Evaluating Sensitivity of Parameters of Interest to Measurement Invariance in Latent Variable Models

dsDescriptionValue.value: Data, R code, and adapted version of the SEM package lavaan for reproducing all examples in the paper "Evaluating Sensitivity of Parameters of Interest to Measurement Invariance in Latent Variable Models", which introduces the "EPC-interest" measure to assess measurement equivalence.

publicationCitation.value: Daniel L Oberski. 2014. "Evaluating Sensitivity of Parameters of Interest to Measurement Invariance in Latent Variable Models." Political Analysis (Winter 2014) 22 (1). article available here

files.description: Assess measurement invariance ("equivalence") by looking at how much parameters _of interest_ change when freeing equality restrictions.   Reproduces analyses and provides data to accompany the paper "Evaluating Sensitivity of Parameters of Interest to Measurement Invariance in Latent Variable Models".  You may need to install the experimental version of lavaan, called "lavaanEPC", provided in the .zip file. Implementation of these functions in the main lavaan release should available soon, please check http://lavaan.ugent.be/
files.label: Examples-paper.zip
